text: læa meux rea di klaw kæ ma la xik ah wa “cng suyu d kharwa tx xada m” phwk khea k sædng kharwa wentæ xib lis man xyu nı ca phwk yin dangnan man cung fafun kha sang khxng phraphupenceakhxng man læw phwk cea ca yud xea man læa wngswan khxng man pen phu khumkhrxng xun cak kha kranan hrux hrux? Thang«thi phwk man pen satru kab phwk cea man chang chawcha thæ«nı kar lækpeliyn sahrab phwk xthrrm”
